short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distraction-Free Reading for Geeksforgeeks, complete with a sleek dark theme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GFGReader is your ultimate solution to decluttered reading on GeeksforGeeks. No more distractions, no more eye strain. Our Chrome extension strips away unnecessary elements, leaving you with a clean, distraction-free interface. Choose between Light and Dark themes for seamless reading in any environment.

Experience the simplicity and focus you deserve with GFGReader.

Rate and share with friends if you love it.

Regards,
Dhruv Mishra
